Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 2/19 in seven overs
Rohit Sharma hit a quickfire fifty with six fours and six sixes
Babar Azam scored his first-ever half-century against India
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed his team's resilience after a close win
India maintained their unbeaten World Cup record against Pakistan
Miscellaneous Highlights: India have won all eight meetings between them and Pakistan at the ICC Men's Cricket World Cups
India have failed to win just four of their last 29 Cricket World Cup games
Pakistan’s collapse saw eight wickets fall for just 36 runs, their worst such collapse at a World Cup
Rohit Sharma became the player with the most across-format sixes in international cricket
Only Gayle has hit more maximums at white-ball World Cups, with Rohit’s latest efforts taking him above AB de Villiers
Others: Sachin Tendulkar brought out the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023 trophy prior to India's match against Pakistan
The match was part of the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023
